item.title: Don’t Let Harmful EU Tech Regulations Spread Across the Globe
item.description: It’s past time for the U.S. government to push back on these discriminatory foreign policies.

item.title: There’s No Sex Discrimination Without Sex
item.description: A Supreme Court argument comes down to the most basic difference between men and women.

item.title: Putin’s Rapidly Shrinking World
item.description: Russia continues to lose allies and influence around the world.

item.title: Jay Kelly, a Movie Star’s Pity Party About the Cost of Fame
item.description: Baumbach seems trapped in his own dishonest fantasy, attempting to fashion a glamorous Willy Loman out of a self-sentimentalizing Hollywood egotist.

item.title: How to Alleviate the Middle-Class Crunch on Homeownership
item.description: Current IRS tax rules trap empty-nest Boomers and freeze out younger homebuyers. It’s time to change them.
